channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Administration Division: Roof Replacements Scheduled for Summer Months
item.description: All members of the campus community should note that roof replacements are scheduled for the Materials Research Center (MRC), Empire State Hall (ESH), and the west wing of the Jonsson Rowland Science Center (JRSC). Construction will begin on Monday, June 17 and be completed by Friday, August 9, with tentative daily work hours set for 6:00AM to 2:30PM, Monday through Friday.
item.author: Community

item.title: James Hendler Elected to WAMC Board of Trustees
item.description: At its annual meeting in May 2024, WAMC elected Rensselaer’s James Hendler, Ph.D., to its Board of Trustees. At RPI, Hendler is the director of the Future of Computing Institute, Tetherless World Professor of Computer, Web, and Cognitive Sciences, and director of the RPI-IBM Future of Computing Research Collaboration.
item.author: Community

item.title: Planning to Graduate in August 2024?
item.description: Have you completed your degree application in SIS yet? If not, SIS is now open to apply; the deadline is Monday, July 8. Make sure you also refer to Registrar’s Graduation & Commencement webpage for other details.
item.author: Community

item.title: RPI Doctoral Student Designs Ways for Humans and Machines to Work “Symbiotically”
item.description: From lane-keep assistance to blind spot detection, today’s cars come equipped with autonomous driving features that make driving easier and safer. Rene Mai, a doctoral student at Rensselaer, imagines a world in which humans and machines complement each other’s strengths to do more together, a concept known as “symbiotic autonomy.”

item.title: Rensselaer Collegiate Store Announces Session Break Week Hours
item.description: The Rensselaer Collegiate Store will close for the Summer Session Break Week at 4pm on Friday, June 28 and will remain closed until 10am on Monday, July 8. During this time, the Store’s website will still be available and members of the campus community can also e-mail the staff. Thank you!…

item.title: Registration Now Open for Summer 2024 Undergraduate Research Fair
item.description: Date: Monday, June 24, 2024 - Wed , July 17, 2024 (all day) - Undergraduate students of all majors who are participating in summer research are encouraged to register by July 17 for the Summer 2024 Undergraduate Research Fair, which will be hosted by the School of Science and take place from 3:00PM to 5:00PM on Wednesday, July 31 in the CBIS Atrium. It’s a great opportunity to present your work to the faculty and your peers!
item.author: Students

item.title: Tour of Curia Global Albany Campus to be Held for Arch Students
item.description:
Date: Wednesday, July 10, 2024 10:00 AM - 2:00 PM - All Arch students are welcome to join the School of Science for an academic field trip to the Albany campus of Curia Global, a global contract research, development and manufacturing organization (CDMO) offering products and services across the drug development spectrum. The event will include a tour of the facilities, followed by lunch. Please contact the School of Science to sign up!
